item.title: 508 ActionButton.java

item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

try this

if (buttonId == 22) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } if (p.rights == 0){ p.teleportTo(2679, 3402, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Chill zone."); } if (p.donator > 0) { p.teleportTo(2346, 3171, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Donator zone."); } if (p.rights > 0) { p.teleportTo(2636, 9912, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Staff Zone."); } }

..:: Compile Activated ::.. .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:281: orphaned case case 591: ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:1880: class, interface, o r enum expected } ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:279: break outside switch or loop break; ^ 3 errors ..:: Compiled Completely. ::.. item.title: 508 ActionButton.java
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I am trying to add this to ActionButtion.java but It gave me 100 errors.

if (buttonId == 22) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } if (p.rights == 0) p.teleportTo(2679, 3402, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Chill zone."); } if (p.donator > 0) p.teleportTo(2346, 3171, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Donator zone."); } if (p.rights > 0) p.teleportTo(2636, 9912, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Staff Zone."); }
What can i do to the code so that it wont give me the 100 errors?
Thanks guys.

Read full topic
